testcase.classname: US24_Patient can view the test result and the invoice
testcase.name: AC01 Patient can view the test result
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed Then User signs in as a patient.............................................passed Then Patient clicks on My Page..............................................passed Then Patient clicks on My Appointments......................................passed Then Patient clicks on one of the Show Tests................................passed Then Patient clicks on one of the View Results..............................passed And Patient verifies test results header is displayed.......................passed And Patient verifies all test items are displayed...........................passed And Patent closes the browser..............................................passed
